sentences: Robert Vaughan "Bobby" Sheehan (June 12, 1968 â€“ August 20, 1999) was an American musician and songwriter best known as a founding member and bassist of Blues Traveler.
Sheehan attended the Berklee College of Music and co-founded Blues Traveler in 1987.
He died of an accidental overdose of heroin, cocaine, and Valium in 1999.
